title: continuous diagnostics and mitigation
extract: Continuous Diagnostics and Mitigation (CDM) Consistent with the Federal Government's deployment of Information Security Continuous Monitoring (ISCM), the Continuous Diagnostics and Mitigation (CDM) Program is a dynamic approach to fortifying the cybersecurity of government networks and systems.Sep 17, 2018
extract_html: Continuous Diagnostics and Mitigation (CDM) Consistent with the Federal Government's deployment of Information Security Continuous Monitoring (ISCM), the Continuous Diagnostics and Mitigation (CDM) Program is a dynamic approach to fortifying the cybersecurity of government networks and systems.Sep 17, 2018
